title.guidance: With strong and offensive language and disturbing images.
title.synopsis: A tough Christmas Eve for Hollamby results in a dreamlike vision that changes her attitude. Meanwhile, Julie S. has a frightful visit to the Larkhall drainage system.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Smash-hit 00s prison drama - watch the battle to survive at HMP Larkhall

brand.title: Bad Girls

synopses.ninety: Smash-hit 00s prison drama - watch the battle to survive at HMP Larkhall

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: As the inmates rehearse for a fashion show and Helen is forced into an alliance with difficult inmate. When a smelly convict returns, she upsets everyone with her nasty habits.

description.descriptionTextNormal: As the inmates rehearse for a fashion show and Helen is forced into an alliance with difficult inmate. When a smelly convict returns, she upsets everyone with her nasty habits.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Struggling to cope with being separated from her son Spencer, recent G- Wing arrival Monica Lindsay does all she can to find him a place in a residential home.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Struggling to cope with being separated from her son Spencer, recent G- Wing arrival Monica Lindsay does all she can to find him a place in a residential home.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Zandra is elated to learn that she can marry her newly detoxed boyfriend Robin while behind bars. Meanwhile, Nikki tells Shell about Rachel's relationship.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Zandra is elated to learn that she can marry her newly detoxed boyfriend Robin while behind bars. Meanwhile, Nikki tells Shell about Rachel's relationship.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Zandra makes a request but is she telling the truth? As hard-bitten inmate Shell forces her to smuggle drugs into Larkhall, Rachel despairs.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Zandra makes a request but is she telling the truth? As hard-bitten inmate Shell forces her to smuggle drugs into Larkhall, Rachel despairs.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Helen starts investigating what happened to Rachel, and the tension between Nikki and prison bully Shell boils over.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Helen starts investigating what happened to Rachel, and the tension between Nikki and prison bully Shell boils over.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Helen tames a notoriously difficult prisoner, unwittingly earning the admiration of Nikki. Meanwhile, Lorna risks everything by supplying a prisoner with drugs.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Helen tames a notoriously difficult prisoner, unwittingly earning the admiration of Nikki. Meanwhile, Lorna risks everything by supplying a prisoner with drugs.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Shell makes off with Zandra's stash of pills, having discovered Lorna's sideline in drug smuggling, but Shell only succeeds in making things a whole lot worse for herself.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Shell makes off with Zandra's stash of pills, having discovered Lorna's sideline in drug smuggling, but Shell only succeeds in making things a whole lot worse for herself.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Monica thinks her fortunes have finally taken a turn for the better, but she's about to be dealt a devastating blow. Shell devises a cunning plan to put Lorna in her place.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Monica thinks her fortunes have finally taken a turn for the better, but she's about to be dealt a devastating blow. Shell devises a cunning plan to put Lorna in her place.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Taken in by Shell's apparent religious conversion, Lorna agrees to do the troublemaker one last favour, and the press get hold of a scandal on G Wing.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Taken in by Shell's apparent religious conversion, Lorna agrees to do the troublemaker one last favour, and the press get hold of a scandal on G Wing.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Helen is tortured by a sense of unease as the day of her wedding to Sean approaches. Monica is determined that she won't be subjected to life on the outside without her son.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Helen is tortured by a sense of unease as the day of her wedding to Sean approaches. Monica is determined that she won't be subjected to life on the outside without her son.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: G Wing is in turmoil. Wing Governor Helen Stewart hasn't returned from vacation, and Senior Officer Jim Fenner is in charge.

description.descriptionTextNormal: G Wing is in turmoil. Wing Governor Helen Stewart hasn't returned from vacation, and Senior Officer Jim Fenner is in charge.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Using a mobile phone smuggled into Larkhall by prison worker Josh, Shell continues to torment Marilyn. The disturbing anonymous telephone calls to the Fenner household alarm Jim.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Using a mobile phone smuggled into Larkhall by prison worker Josh, Shell continues to torment Marilyn. The disturbing anonymous telephone calls to the Fenner household alarm Jim.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: With his marriage on the rocks, his career on the line and now the police on his doorstep, Jim realises that he could well find himself behind bars.

description.descriptionTextNormal: With his marriage on the rocks, his career on the line and now the police on his doorstep, Jim realises that he could well find himself behind bars.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Denny Blood has been feeling sad since her mother didn't show up as planned on visitors' day, so Yvonne tries to boost both her mood and her confidence.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Denny Blood has been feeling sad since her mother didn't show up as planned on visitors' day, so Yvonne tries to boost both her mood and her confidence.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Life on G Wing gets hectic when a batch of newcomers arrive. "Mad" Tessa Spall strikes fear into the prison officers because of her reputation for extreme violence.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Life on G Wing gets hectic when a batch of newcomers arrive. "Mad" Tessa Spall strikes fear into the prison officers because of her reputation for extreme violence.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Karen reprimands Senior Officer Sylvia for mixing up two prisoners. When talk turns to Sylvia's recent injury, Karen decides to put her on an exercise and health routine.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Karen reprimands Senior Officer Sylvia for mixing up two prisoners. When talk turns to Sylvia's recent injury, Karen decides to put her on an exercise and health routine.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Helen returns to Larkhall in a new Home Office position, much to the delight of Nikki Wade and the dismay of prison officers, Jim and Sylvia.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Helen returns to Larkhall in a new Home Office position, much to the delight of Nikki Wade and the dismay of prison officers, Jim and Sylvia.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Crystal's release is coming up at the end of the week and Josh looks forward to spending more time with her, but she feels conflicted.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Crystal's release is coming up at the end of the week and Josh looks forward to spending more time with her, but she feels conflicted.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Zandra's pain makes those around her feel awkward about showing their true emotions. She's also finding it more and more difficult to express herself.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Zandra's pain makes those around her feel awkward about showing their true emotions. She's also finding it more and more difficult to express herself.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: After seeing Zandra's little boy, the two Julies experience the desire to have a child. Since they are clearly determined women, they resolve to get what they want.

description.descriptionTextNormal: After seeing Zandra's little boy, the two Julies experience the desire to have a child. Since they are clearly determined women, they resolve to get what they want.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Renee is making enemies fast and creating a growing list of inmates with murderous intentions. When tragedy strikes, the police have a plethora of suspects to interview.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Renee is making enemies fast and creating a growing list of inmates with murderous intentions. When tragedy strikes, the police have a plethora of suspects to interview.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Jealousy and intrigue are in the air at Larkhall's G Wing when news reaches Nikki of Helen and Dominic's date. Nikki's jealous temper flares up.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Jealousy and intrigue are in the air at Larkhall's G Wing when news reaches Nikki of Helen and Dominic's date. Nikki's jealous temper flares up.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Sylvia hosts her 30th wedding anniversary party in the officers' club and all of the officers let their hair down.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Sylvia hosts her 30th wedding anniversary party in the officers' club and all of the officers let their hair down.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Revenge-hungry Shell is locked in a cell with Fenner, which forces the officers, who are still recovering from Hollamby's party, to take drastic action.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Revenge-hungry Shell is locked in a cell with Fenner, which forces the officers, who are still recovering from Hollamby's party, to take drastic action.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: After Shell's attack, Hollamby becomes determined to make her suffer, and transfers Shell to a psychiatric ward.

description.descriptionTextNormal: After Shell's attack, Hollamby becomes determined to make her suffer, and transfers Shell to a psychiatric ward.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Shell is confined to her cell while Julie S. is out of prison on a home-detention curfew, and Sylvie proposes a strike.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Shell is confined to her cell while Julie S. is out of prison on a home-detention curfew, and Sylvie proposes a strike.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Julie S. returns to Larkhall while Yvonne spends some time with male escorts recommended by Nikki. Meanwhile, Barbara receives a shock when she hears what she's been accused of.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Julie S. returns to Larkhall while Yvonne spends some time with male escorts recommended by Nikki. Meanwhile, Barbara receives a shock when she hears what she's been accused of.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Denny's life hangs in the balance after a new arrival, Buki Lester, challenges her. Yvonne fights with Charlie in court, and Fenner returns to work to find Shell waiting for him.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Denny's life hangs in the balance after a new arrival, Buki Lester, challenges her. Yvonne fights with Charlie in court, and Fenner returns to work to find Shell waiting for him.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Tensions rise as Podger Pam arrives in G Wing. Josh begins his stint as a trainee prison officer under the watchful eye of Di, who seems a little obsessed with him.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Tensions rise as Podger Pam arrives in G Wing. Josh begins his stint as a trainee prison officer under the watchful eye of Di, who seems a little obsessed with him.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: A TV documentary crew invades Larkhall to make a series, creating havoc. Buki reveals the truth about her childhood, and Fenner sees an opportunity to get rid of Shell for good.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A TV documentary crew invades Larkhall to make a series, creating havoc. Buki reveals the truth about her childhood, and Fenner sees an opportunity to get rid of Shell for good.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Shell and Denny celebrate by bingeing on vodka and cocaine. They also decide to settle some scores with Sylvia and Hollamby.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Shell and Denny celebrate by bingeing on vodka and cocaine. They also decide to settle some scores with Sylvia and Hollamby.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Charlotte, a young aristocrat, is sentenced to a year in Larkhall for drug offences. Not fond of her attitude, the other inmates soon begin to terrorise her.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Charlotte, a young aristocrat, is sentenced to a year in Larkhall for drug offences. Not fond of her attitude, the other inmates soon begin to terrorise her.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: When Crystal goes on a hunger strike to protest her incorrect drug test results, new inmate Charlotte is the one who supports her.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When Crystal goes on a hunger strike to protest her incorrect drug test results, new inmate Charlotte is the one who supports her.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: When a Nigerian prisoner, Femi, is bullied by the officers, Nikki organises a sit-in to help, then the Peckham Boot Gang become involved...

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a Nigerian prisoner, Femi, is bullied by the officers, Nikki organises a sit-in to help, then the Peckham Boot Gang become involved...

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Nikki is currently very unpopular, so she is grateful for the support from an attractive new prisoner, Caroline ... that is, until Maxi discovers some surprises in Caroline's past.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Nikki is currently very unpopular, so she is grateful for the support from an attractive new prisoner, Caroline ... that is, until Maxi discovers some surprises in Caroline's past.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Brothel madam Virginia is sentenced to Larkhall, where she surprises two of her former employees. Virginia is stuck in a wheelchair, and G Wing is ill-equipped to deal with her.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Brothel madam Virginia is sentenced to Larkhall, where she surprises two of her former employees. Virginia is stuck in a wheelchair, and G Wing is ill-equipped to deal with her.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: After hearing that Fenner and Virginia reached an agreement that could make him very rich, Helen and Yvonne attempt to prove that Fenner is unfit to work with women prisoners.

description.descriptionTextNormal: After hearing that Fenner and Virginia reached an agreement that could make him very rich, Helen and Yvonne attempt to prove that Fenner is unfit to work with women prisoners.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: After a deal is exposed, Fenner fights back using Barbara's diary. Meanwhile, Tina develops an unlikely friendship with Virginia, causing problems with Maxi and Al.

description.descriptionTextNormal: After a deal is exposed, Fenner fights back using Barbara's diary. Meanwhile, Tina develops an unlikely friendship with Virginia, causing problems with Maxi and Al.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: As Fenner's efforts to discredit Helen heat up, Nikki's appeal gives him the more opportunity to set his plans in motion. The Peckham Boot Gang seem to mend fences with Virginia.

description.descriptionTextNormal: As Fenner's efforts to discredit Helen heat up, Nikki's appeal gives him the more opportunity to set his plans in motion. The Peckham Boot Gang seem to mend fences with Virginia.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: When Yvonne is accused of murder, she takes drastic measures to avoid being charged, and Shell and Denny try to avoid arrest in Spain.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When Yvonne is accused of murder, she takes drastic measures to avoid being charged, and Shell and Denny try to avoid arrest in Spain.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: A new governor, Neil Grayling, arrives at Larkhall determined to make his mark. Meanwhile, Di meets a new prison officer but finds out he is not a very nice person.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A new governor, Neil Grayling, arrives at Larkhall determined to make his mark. Meanwhile, Di meets a new prison officer but finds out he is not a very nice person.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Fenner is governor once again, but is horrified to learn something about Yvonne which forces him into a tentative alliance with her.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Fenner is governor once again, but is horrified to learn something about Yvonne which forces him into a tentative alliance with her.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Denny arrives back on G Wing with two new inmates, Cassie Tyler and Roisin Connor, but Denny wants nothing to do with Shaz, who must contend with her old nemesis Bodybag.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Denny arrives back on G Wing with two new inmates, Cassie Tyler and Roisin Connor, but Denny wants nothing to do with Shaz, who must contend with her old nemesis Bodybag.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Neil's unpopularity increases because of his apparent personal vendetta against Karen. Yvonne and Maxi come to blows when Virginia's killer is revealed.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Neil's unpopularity increases because of his apparent personal vendetta against Karen. Yvonne and Maxi come to blows when Virginia's killer is revealed.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Julie J. becomes distraught when she finds her daughter in G Wing, and the truth about Rhiannon's boyfriend leads to a big mistake by the Julies.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Julie J. becomes distraught when she finds her daughter in G Wing, and the truth about Rhiannon's boyfriend leads to a big mistake by the Julies.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Fenner finally realises that Neil, his boss, has an interest in him that extends beyond their occupation. Shaz and Denny begin to push Buki too far, and Karen and Mark grow closer.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Fenner finally realises that Neil, his boss, has an interest in him that extends beyond their occupation. Shaz and Denny begin to push Buki too far, and Karen and Mark grow closer.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Unable to cope with continual harassment, Buki harms herself. Roisin begins taking drugs to block out the suffering of being a prisoner.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Unable to cope with continual harassment, Buki harms herself. Roisin begins taking drugs to block out the suffering of being a prisoner.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: When Yvonne and Maxi come to blows, the consequences are dramatic. Crystal gives birth, and Buki reveals the reasons for wanting to be part of the prison's Mothers and Babies Unit.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When Yvonne and Maxi come to blows, the consequences are dramatic. Crystal gives birth, and Buki reveals the reasons for wanting to be part of the prison's Mothers and Babies Unit.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: After being assaulted, Karen struggles to cope, but she realises that involving the police would be futile. Crystal makes a desperate bid to get her baby away from prison.

description.descriptionTextNormal: After being assaulted, Karen struggles to cope, but she realises that involving the police would be futile. Crystal makes a desperate bid to get her baby away from prison.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Neil is in dire need of a new governor but Karen turns down the job which means that only Hollamby is left. Shaz and Al plan to fight but Maxi wants a piece of Shaz.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Neil is in dire need of a new governor but Karen turns down the job which means that only Hollamby is left. Shaz and Al plan to fight but Maxi wants a piece of Shaz.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: An inspection team visits the prison, and Cassie and Roisin's relationship deteriorates further. Yvonne is delighted to have her estranged son visit her.

description.descriptionTextNormal: An inspection team visits the prison, and Cassie and Roisin's relationship deteriorates further. Yvonne is delighted to have her estranged son visit her.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: A vacant cell in G Wing is immediately filled by a mysterious American blonde who catches Fenner's eye. Then Yvonne realises she recognises her.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A vacant cell in G Wing is immediately filled by a mysterious American blonde who catches Fenner's eye. Then Yvonne realises she recognises her.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Rhiannon attempts to make amends with her mother and aunt when they are sentenced to eight years. Although Denny's mother is found, Denny finds that her excitement is short lived.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Rhiannon attempts to make amends with her mother and aunt when they are sentenced to eight years. Although Denny's mother is found, Denny finds that her excitement is short lived.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Yvonne and Fenner are concerned about Karen's new relationship for different reasons. Newcomer Snowball continues to manipulate the inmates in G Wing and makes plans to escape.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Yvonne and Fenner are concerned about Karen's new relationship for different reasons. Newcomer Snowball continues to manipulate the inmates in G Wing and makes plans to escape.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: G Wing holds an open day, and everyone is shocked when Snowball's plan reaches fruition. Yvonne spends her day with a visiting male escort.

description.descriptionTextNormal: G Wing holds an open day, and everyone is shocked when Snowball's plan reaches fruition. Yvonne spends her day with a visiting male escort.

episodes.guidance: With flashing images, strong language, violence and adult scenes
episodes.synopsis: Fenner joins some of his fellow prison officers on a weekend in Amsterdam. They're all interested in an erotic dancer until they realise that her face is uncomfortably familiar.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Fenner joins some of his fellow prison officers on a weekend in Amsterdam. They're all interested in an erotic dancer until they realise that her face is uncomfortably familiar.

episodes.guidance: With flashing images, strong language, nudity, violence and adult scenes
episodes.synopsis: Shell, with Denny's help, plans to implicate Snowball for a death. Meanwhile, Fenner has his own plans for Shell and Snowball starts to put another scheme into action.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Shell, with Denny's help, plans to implicate Snowball for a death. Meanwhile, Fenner has his own plans for Shell and Snowball starts to put another scheme into action.

episodes.guidance: Contains flashing images with adult themes.
episodes.synopsis: The Costa Cons, Phyl and Bev, arrive at Larkhall with a suitcase full of gin bottles, but Shell is the only one who isn't convinced they're as naïve as they appear.

description.descriptionTextNormal: The Costa Cons, Phyl and Bev, arrive at Larkhall with a suitcase full of gin bottles, but Shell is the only one who isn't convinced they're as naïve as they appear.

episodes.guidance: With flashing images, violence, strong language and adult scenes
episodes.synopsis: When Colin advises Shell to carry on "business as usual," she threatens to reveal the truth about Fenner - but this backfires badly for her.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When Colin advises Shell to carry on "business as usual," she threatens to reveal the truth about Fenner - but this backfires badly for her.

episodes.guidance: With flashing images, strong language, violence, drugs and adult scenes
episodes.synopsis: Yvonne starts working on uncovering the truth about Shell. Meanwhile, Di finds life with Neil increasingly frustrating as he starts using their marital home for his exploits.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Yvonne starts working on uncovering the truth about Shell. Meanwhile, Di finds life with Neil increasingly frustrating as he starts using their marital home for his exploits.

episodes.guidance: With strong language, themes of drug use and flashing images.
episodes.synopsis: One of Phyl and Bev's many business ventures comes to light when Colin makes a discovery, but lucky for them, he's unlikely to turn them in.

description.descriptionTextNormal: One of Phyl and Bev's many business ventures comes to light when Colin makes a discovery, but lucky for them, he's unlikely to turn them in.

episodes.guidance: With strong language, violence, themes of drug abuse and suicide, and flashing images.
episodes.synopsis: The presence of the media and a celebrity guest at Larkhall give the women a perfect opportunity to make a very public protest.

description.descriptionTextNormal: The presence of the media and a celebrity guest at Larkhall give the women a perfect opportunity to make a very public protest.

episodes.guidance: With strong language, adult themes and flashing images.
episodes.synopsis: Colin escorts Yvonne to a funeral and is placed in a very difficult position when Fenner gets up to his old tricks on their return.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Colin escorts Yvonne to a funeral and is placed in a very difficult position when Fenner gets up to his old tricks on their return.

episodes.guidance: With strong language, adult themes and flashing images.
episodes.synopsis: Colin finally tells Karen the truth about Yvonne. Meanwhile, Julie S. struggles with the reality of her health and the procedures she must face.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Colin finally tells Karen the truth about Yvonne. Meanwhile, Julie S. struggles with the reality of her health and the procedures she must face.

episodes.guidance: With strong language, adult themes and flashing images.
episodes.synopsis: Karen persuades Neil to take Snowball out of solitary confinement, hoping it will lift her spirits. Yvonne then gets roped in to protect Snowball.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Karen persuades Neil to take Snowball out of solitary confinement, hoping it will lift her spirits. Yvonne then gets roped in to protect Snowball.

episodes.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references, drug use and suicide scenes.
episodes.synopsis: Fenner gets into serious trouble when allegations are made against him, and Karen and Helen Stewart also accuse him of wrongdoing.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Fenner gets into serious trouble when allegations are made against him, and Karen and Helen Stewart also accuse him of wrongdoing.

episodes.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: A familiar face is welcomed back to Larkhall as old-timer Noreen Biggs arrives on G Wing. Unfortunately, she won't be enjoying her time for long.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A familiar face is welcomed back to Larkhall as old-timer Noreen Biggs arrives on G Wing. Unfortunately, she won't be enjoying her time for long.

episodes.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: When Fenner does the unthinkable and goes out to discover what evidence Karen has against him, he doesn't like what he finds and decides to take revenge.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When Fenner does the unthinkable and goes out to discover what evidence Karen has against him, he doesn't like what he finds and decides to take revenge.

episodes.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Kris Yates, a new inmate who has been sentenced to life, arrives at Larkhall. She makes a big impression on new officer Selena Geeson, who requests Kris as her personal officer.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Kris Yates, a new inmate who has been sentenced to life, arrives at Larkhall. She makes a big impression on new officer Selena Geeson, who requests Kris as her personal officer.

episodes.guidance: With scenes of violence, strong and offensive language.
episodes.synopsis: Kris talks to Yvonne about an escape plan, but Yvonne doesn't want any part of it, and Denny's art exhibition experiences a setback.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Kris talks to Yvonne about an escape plan, but Yvonne doesn't want any part of it, and Denny's art exhibition experiences a setback.

episodes.guidance: With scenes of violence, strong and offensive language.
episodes.synopsis: Henry's brother objects to a planned wedding and departs. Meanwhile, Buki looks forward to her release, and Yvonne decides to give Kris's plan a try.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Henry's brother objects to a planned wedding and departs. Meanwhile, Buki looks forward to her release, and Yvonne decides to give Kris's plan a try.

episodes.guidance: With scenes of violence, strong and offensive language.
episodes.synopsis: Two new inmates arrive with secrets - one of which is deadlier than the other. Selena secretly assists Kris so she can follow Yvonne's route out of the prison.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Two new inmates arrive with secrets - one of which is deadlier than the other. Selena secretly assists Kris so she can follow Yvonne's route out of the prison.

episodes.guidance: With scenes of violence, strong and offensive language and scenes of attempted suicide.
episodes.synopsis: The new governor, Frances Myers, decides to make her presence known to the women of G Wing, who all knew her as inmate Frances Allen.

description.descriptionTextNormal: The new governor, Frances Myers, decides to make her presence known to the women of G Wing, who all knew her as inmate Frances Allen.

episodes.guidance: With scenes of violence, strong and offensive language.
episodes.synopsis: Fenner is riddled with guilt over Yvonne and convinced her daughter is out for revenge, but the real danger might be closer than he thinks...

description.descriptionTextNormal: Fenner is riddled with guilt over Yvonne and convinced her daughter is out for revenge, but the real danger might be closer than he thinks...

episodes.guidance: With violence, racial themes and adult scenes.
episodes.synopsis: Convicted of murdering a relative, a Muslim woman maintains that she is innocent and climbs up on the roof of G Wing to continue her protest.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Convicted of murdering a relative, a Muslim woman maintains that she is innocent and climbs up on the roof of G Wing to continue her protest.

episodes.guidance: With violence and adult scenes.
episodes.synopsis: The unrepentant Natalie Buxton returns and proves to be an unpopular prisoner. Having been convicted of child prostitution, she has a lot to prove if she is going to survive.

description.descriptionTextNormal: The unrepentant Natalie Buxton returns and proves to be an unpopular prisoner. Having been convicted of child prostitution, she has a lot to prove if she is going to survive.

episodes.guidance: With violence, adult scenes and flashing images.
episodes.synopsis: Tanya Tucker, a glamorous footballer's wife, arrives at the prison for possession of Class A drugs. With a tough time ahead of her, she goes on a mission to help a friend.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Tanya Tucker, a glamorous footballer's wife, arrives at the prison for possession of Class A drugs. With a tough time ahead of her, she goes on a mission to help a friend.

episodes.guidance: With adult scenes.
episodes.synopsis: As Fenner returns to G Wing, everyone fears that they'll be poisoned again. The women become desperate to find out who is responsible - and the new arrival is the top suspect.

description.descriptionTextNormal: As Fenner returns to G Wing, everyone fears that they'll be poisoned again. The women become desperate to find out who is responsible - and the new arrival is the top suspect.

episodes.guidance: With violence and adult scenes.
episodes.synopsis: Frances gets into deep trouble when she is suddenly thrown into a violent and illegal plan from the outside. Colin leaves to clear his head, but only Julie S. knows why.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Frances gets into deep trouble when she is suddenly thrown into a violent and illegal plan from the outside. Colin leaves to clear his head, but only Julie S. knows why.

episodes.guidance: Contains adult themes and some language that some viewers may find offensive.
episodes.synopsis: Upset that Colin is gone, Julie J. hears about why he left from Julie S., who undergoes another medical scan and receives good news.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Upset that Colin is gone, Julie J. hears about why he left from Julie S., who undergoes another medical scan and receives good news.

episodes.guidance: Contains flashing images with adult themes and very strong offensive language.
episodes.synopsis: Although his career is in serious jeopardy, Neil remains calm and determined to find former Wing Governor Karen Betts, believing she holds information that could bring down Fenner.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Although his career is in serious jeopardy, Neil remains calm and determined to find former Wing Governor Karen Betts, believing she holds information that could bring down Fenner.

episodes.guidance: Contains flashing images with violence, adult themes and mild language.
episodes.synopsis: Selena is in deep trouble, and Frances realizes that she and Kris used to live together. Neil and Karen close in on Fenner, who was filmed running from an accident.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Selena is in deep trouble, and Frances realizes that she and Kris used to live together. Neil and Karen close in on Fenner, who was filmed running from an accident.

episodes.guidance: Contains flashing images with adult themes mild language.
episodes.synopsis: Jim is very happy that he and Di are going to get married, but when he sees Neil and Karen entering the church clutching a big envelope, he goes cold with panic.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Jim is very happy that he and Di are going to get married, but when he sees Neil and Karen entering the church clutching a big envelope, he goes cold with panic.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Fenner has a difficult time adjusting to life on the other side of the bars when some fellow inmates start harassing the former prison officer.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Fenner has a difficult time adjusting to life on the other side of the bars when some fellow inmates start harassing the former prison officer.

episodes.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: Dr. Nicholson overhears Hollamby receiving some surprising and fortunate news. Not surprisingly, the greedy doctor suddenly finds her irresistible. Meanwhile, Fenner is released from prison and finds his way directly into Di's waiting arms.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Dr. Nicholson overhears Hollamby receiving some surprising and fortunate news. Not surprisingly, the greedy doctor suddenly finds her irresistible. Meanwhile, Fenner is released from prison and finds his way directly into Di's waiting arms.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: In charge on G-Wing, Natalie seems to have everyone in her debt. She even has a cushy job working in the library, which serves as the perfect place to set a trap for Arun.

description.descriptionTextNormal: In charge on G-Wing, Natalie seems to have everyone in her debt. She even has a cushy job working in the library, which serves as the perfect place to set a trap for Arun.

episodes.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references, hard drug use & scenes of suicide.
episodes.synopsis: A swarm of press arrives outside Larkhall awaiting the arrival of Laura Canning, who has been convicted of stabbing her mother to death but seems incapable of such brutality.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A swarm of press arrives outside Larkhall awaiting the arrival of Laura Canning, who has been convicted of stabbing her mother to death but seems incapable of such brutality.

episodes.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references & hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: An elderly nun, Sister Thomas-Moore, arrives at Larkhall for a six-month sentence for embezzlement. Since she hates nuns, Natalie takes it upon herself to make sure the Sister's stay is unpleasant. Meanwhile, Arun has a secret.

description.descriptionTextNormal: An elderly nun, Sister Thomas-Moore, arrives at Larkhall for a six-month sentence for embezzlement. Since she hates nuns, Natalie takes it upon herself to make sure the Sister's stay is unpleasant. Meanwhile, Arun has a secret.

episodes.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references & hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: New inmate Pat Kerrigan is transferred to Larkhall from another prison and immediately makes an impact by holding Sister Thomas at knifepoint in retaliation for abuse that Pat suffered as a child at the hands of the nun.

description.descriptionTextNormal: New inmate Pat Kerrigan is transferred to Larkhall from another prison and immediately makes an impact by holding Sister Thomas at knifepoint in retaliation for abuse that Pat suffered as a child at the hands of the nun.

episodes.guidance: Contains violence, mild language and adult themes
episodes.synopsis: The thought of being transferred to a men's prison makes Arun suicidal. Pat steps in to defend Arun after Natalie's harsh words drive her to despair.

description.descriptionTextNormal: The thought of being transferred to a men's prison makes Arun suicidal. Pat steps in to defend Arun after Natalie's harsh words drive her to despair.

episodes.guidance: Contains violence, mild language and adult themes
episodes.synopsis: Fenner cannot believe it when Di acquires baby Dylan from one of the inmates. Disgusted by the return of Pat, who has overtaken G-Wing, Natalie resumes her escape plans.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Fenner cannot believe it when Di acquires baby Dylan from one of the inmates. Disgusted by the return of Pat, who has overtaken G-Wing, Natalie resumes her escape plans.

episodes.guidance: Contains violence, mild language and adult themes
episodes.synopsis: When Bev rescues Phyl from being assaulted by a lowlife deliveryman, the daring act proves fortunate, as it gives the pair a chance for freedom.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When Bev rescues Phyl from being assaulted by a lowlife deliveryman, the daring act proves fortunate, as it gives the pair a chance for freedom.

episodes.guidance: Contains violence, mild language and adult themes
episodes.synopsis: Fenner has no idea that most of Larkhall wants to make him pay for Yvonne. Meanwhile, Neil is suspended as acting governor pending an investigation into an escape.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Fenner has no idea that most of Larkhall wants to make him pay for Yvonne. Meanwhile, Neil is suspended as acting governor pending an investigation into an escape.

episodes.guidance: Contains violence, mild language and adult themes
episodes.synopsis: News about Jim Fenner means euphoria prevails in Larkhall. Joy Masterson, the new, ex-army, no-nonsense governor arrives as Neil gets demoted to governor of G-Wing only.

description.descriptionTextNormal: News about Jim Fenner means euphoria prevails in Larkhall. Joy Masterson, the new, ex-army, no-nonsense governor arrives as Neil gets demoted to governor of G-Wing only.

episodes.guidance: with mild language, sexual scenes and violence
episodes.synopsis: Di is accused of the murder of Fenner and finds herself on the wrong side of the bars at Larkhall after Neil pulls some strings to get her sent to G-Wing. Natalie attempts to make her escape while out visiting her so-called brother.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Di is accused of the murder of Fenner and finds herself on the wrong side of the bars at Larkhall after Neil pulls some strings to get her sent to G-Wing. Natalie attempts to make her escape while out visiting her so-called brother.

episodes.guidance: CONTAINS VIOLENCE, MILD LANGUAGE AND ADULT SCENES
episodes.synopsis: It's Christmas Eve on G-Wing. As newcomer Miranda Miles arrives, Julie J. returns to Larkhall, still seeing ghosts of Fenner.

description.descriptionTextNormal: It's Christmas Eve on G-Wing. As newcomer Miranda Miles arrives, Julie J. returns to Larkhall, still seeing ghosts of Fenner.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: A new deputy governor, Lou Stoke, doesn't make the best impression on her first day at Larkhall. Meanwhile, new inmate Emira, the wife of a supposed terrorist bomber, arrives.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A new deputy governor, Lou Stoke, doesn't make the best impression on her first day at Larkhall. Meanwhile, new inmate Emira, the wife of a supposed terrorist bomber, arrives.

episodes.guidance: CONTAINS VIOLENCE AND ADULT SCENES
episodes.synopsis: Donny and Lou accompany Janine to her mother's funeral, unaware that Janine has been blackmailed by Natalie and must bring back something.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Donny and Lou accompany Janine to her mother's funeral, unaware that Janine has been blackmailed by Natalie and must bring back something.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: New arrival Angela Robbins has been convicted of arson and attempted murder, but she doesn't seem capable of the crimes, and Lou suspects that something is wrong.

description.descriptionTextNormal: New arrival Angela Robbins has been convicted of arson and attempted murder, but she doesn't seem capable of the crimes, and Lou suspects that something is wrong.

episodes.guidance: With adult themes, violence, mild language and flashing images.
episodes.synopsis: Although Donny shows concern for Janine, she shuns him because he betrayed Emira. A new inmate, Stella Gough, delights Joy by expressing her desire to join the army.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Although Donny shows concern for Janine, she shuns him because he betrayed Emira. A new inmate, Stella Gough, delights Joy by expressing her desire to join the army.

episodes.guidance: With distressing scenes, violence, adult themes and flashing images.
episodes.synopsis: Joy wants Stella transferred to another prison, and Julie S. is happy to get a visit from David, but it turns bittersweet.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Joy wants Stella transferred to another prison, and Julie S. is happy to get a visit from David, but it turns bittersweet.

episodes.guidance: With violence, adult themes and flashing images.
episodes.synopsis: Vicky is still bitter toward Lou despite being cared for by her, and Julie S can't wait to meet her son's bride-to- be, Fidelity.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Vicky is still bitter toward Lou despite being cared for by her, and Julie S can't wait to meet her son's bride-to- be, Fidelity.

episodes.guidance: With adult themes and flashing images.
episodes.synopsis: Natalie's supposed escape from Larkhall makes the national news, while Tina's day in court causes her to panic.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Natalie's supposed escape from Larkhall makes the national news, while Tina's day in court causes her to panic.

episodes.guidance: With distressing scenes and adult themes.
episodes.synopsis: Tina is plagued with guilt and things only get worse. Rowan denies that he is still with his wife, but Lou is skeptical.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Tina is plagued with guilt and things only get worse. Rowan denies that he is still with his wife, but Lou is skeptical.

episodes.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references & hard drug use.
episodes.synopsis: After a near-death experience, Vicky reveals to Lou the truth about Rowan, and Janine and Donny have a tumultuous day visiting her mother's grave.

description.descriptionTextNormal: After a near-death experience, Vicky reveals to Lou the truth about Rowan, and Janine and Donny have a tumultuous day visiting her mother's grave.

episodes.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references & suicide.
episodes.synopsis: Famous entrepreneur and new inmate, Catherine Earlham causes a stir upon arriving at Larkhall. Joy enlists the newcomer for a prison inspection, and Janine makes a shocking discovery.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Famous entrepreneur and new inmate, Catherine Earlham causes a stir upon arriving at Larkhall. Joy enlists the newcomer for a prison inspection, and Janine makes a shocking discovery.

episodes.guidance: With strong and offensive language and disturbing images.
episodes.synopsis: A tough Christmas Eve for Hollamby results in a dreamlike vision that changes her attitude. Meanwhile, Julie S. has a frightful visit to the Larkhall drainage system.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A tough Christmas Eve for Hollamby results in a dreamlike vision that changes her attitude. Meanwhile, Julie S. has a frightful visit to the Larkhall drainage system.

brand.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Smash-hit 00s prison drama - watch the battle to survive at HMP Larkhall
